item.title: Page link in wordpress
item.description: I have been wondering for sometime now, how K2, added an entry in pages, but the content was controlled from the one of the php files in the theme directory. It turns out that is is very simple (yet elegant … hat’s off to wordpress guys). I used this to integrate FAlbum into K2. Okay, let’s get on with the tutorial: *WARNING*: Take a backup of your database before you proceed with the following
